thread.section_title: Trustpilot UK Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of uk.trustpilot.com
thread.title: Rob Hodgson
thread.title_full: Trustpilot UK reviewed by Rob Hodgson

author: Rob Hodgson
title: Rob Hodgson
text:
I have just had a review removed by Trustpilot - it now seems the norm that a company can have the negative review removed by stating they don't have the person who wrote the review as a customer - it totally skews the genuine rating - I used to think Trustpilot was a good thing but now I tend to look away from Trustpilot for unbiased reviews as I believe TrustPilot have given the Company in question the opportunity to be able to have genuine reviews removed - and why wouldn't they? Trustpilot are a business and get paid to look after the companies which are reviewed - Think about it People?
I expect they will find something wrong with this review and remove it.
